channel.title: Comments on: 30th Dec 06: Top Pot Neon

item.title: By: karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: Gordon, Thank you for your musings at years' end and more photo/camera info. Of course your photography improved! I know mine did, just from viewing yours. Looking forward to your 2007 projects (esp. Noodlehead!) -km-
item.content:encoded:
Gordon,
Thank you for your musings at years’ end and more photo/camera info. Of course your photography improved! I know mine did, just from viewing yours.
Looking forward to your 2007 projects (esp. Noodlehead!)
-km-
